test.instr: (:ins (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:task (give human X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X green))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y closet))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (sort Y closet))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X white) (sort Y chair))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X yellow) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X bottle))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X green) (sort Y bed))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X white) (sort Y desk))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X black) (sort Y refrigerator))) )
test.nl: The refrigerator is not opened. The microwave is not closed. Give human a green book. Put a can in the closet. Put a cup in closet. Put the white book on the chair. Take out the book which is yellow from refrigerator. Pick up a bottle. Put the green bottle on the bed. Put the remotecontrol on the desk. Put the black cup in the refrigerator.
